line_1: Aloud th' Immortal Steeds begin to Neigh,
line_2: And strike their Fiery Hoofs, and make new Day;

line_1: Aloud th' Immortal Steeds begin to Neigh,
line_2: As through she clouds they cut their sparkling way:

line_1: But heaves into big Sighs when he would Neigh.
line_2: Nor knows what Power, his Courage stole away,
